author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Copper pipe repair leaks…This leak was in a tight spot. I deburred the inside and outside of the pipe. Then I marked the depth and used a SharkBite Max 90-degree elbow. All the tubing was supported every 32 inches using a HoldRite telescoping bracket and universal clamp. Many thanks to SharkBite for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#plumbing #sharkbiteplumbing #homerenovation #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Copper Pipe Repair Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
